pr_title: Fix the bug that invalid field appears in alluxio helm chart

timeline.message: fix the bug that invalid field appears in alluxio helm chart

timeline.bodyText: I think "Fix podAffinity for fuse DaemonSet" is better
timeline.author: jiacheliu3
timeline.diffHunk:

 0.6.1
 
 - Infer hostNetwork, dnsPolicy and domain socket volume type based on the user

+0.6.2

+- Fix alluxio chart failed to deploy with helm when "fuse.enabled" is true in values.yaml(issue: #11542)

replies.bodyText: You can leave the url there for the issue tracker like "#11542"
